TopicTitle: No ambient sound of Dock Launch and Runways

Articles.Content:
In KSC main view:

Mouse Over on "Dock Launch" building does not generate any building-specific sound (like VAB or Launchpad or others)
Mouse Over on Runway 1 or 2 does not generate any sound either, only when mouseover on Runway Tower

_______________________________________________________________
game version:
0.1.1.0.21572

OS:
Windows 11

GPU:
NVIDIA Geforce RTX 3090

CPU:
Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-12900K   3.20 GHz
